remove_time.description: The time between playing the retraction animation event and removing the entity.

life_time.description: The life time of this payload. 0 is infinite.

on_retract_ability.description: Ability to play on this unit when it's retracted.

map_icon.description: [material]Icon to display for this payload on the map (if any).

map_name.description: [string]Name to display for this payload on the map (if any).
